sentences.en: Before he leaves home, he needs to learn some basic cookery.
sentences.cn: 离家之前, 他需要学点基本的烹饪技巧.

sentences.en: Cookery Editor Moyra Fraser takes you behind the scenes.
sentences.cn: 烹调专栏主笔莫伊拉·弗雷泽会带您了解幕后的故事。

sentences.en: Courses range from cookery to computing.
sentences.cn: 课程多种多样，从烹调到计算机操作应有尽有。

sentences.en: For pickling , preserving, and cookery, none could excel her.
sentences.cn: 若是制酸菜 、 腌腊蜜饯、烹调, 无人能做得超过她.

sentences.en: Frisee became one of the chic staples of 1980 s cookery.
sentences.cn: 菊苣成了八十年代烹调艺术流行主要材料之一.

sentences.en: He took lessons in Thai cookery.
sentences.cn: 他上了泰式烹饪的课程.

sentences.en: I don't understand television's current obsession with cookery programmes.
sentences.cn: 我不明白为什么现在电视里有如此多烹饪节目.

sentences.en: I took a cordon bleu cookery course.
I've been looking at the cookery book. I like the way it is set out.
sentences.cn: 我翻过那本烹饪书。我喜欢它的版式设计。

sentences.en: Mexican cookery is economical, she says. Nothing goes to waste.
sentences.cn: “墨西哥的烹调注重俭省，”她说，“任何东西都不会浪费。”

sentences.en: The books in the bookstore cover everything, from cookery to cytology.
sentences.cn: 那家书店从烹饪到细胞学各个方面的书都有。

sentences.en: The cookery course was serious and hedonistic at the same time.
sentences.cn: 烹饪课既是一件严肃的事又是一种享受。

sentences.en: They also publish an excellent cookery book called "The Flavours Of Gujarat" (£2.95, plus £0.25 p & p).
sentences.cn: 他们还出版了一本很好的食谱，名叫《古吉拉特美食》（2.95英镑，外加0.25英镑邮资及包装费）。

sentences.en: This cookery book has been written by a real epicure.
sentences.cn: 这本食谱是由一位真正的美食家写的。

sentences.en: This cookery book have being wrote by a real epicure.
sentences.cn: 这本食谱是由一位真正的美食家写的.

words.tran_cn: 炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者
（美）野外郊游时烹调的野餐；野烹食物

trans.tran_cn: 烹饪学，烹饪术，烹调业，<美>厨房
trans.tran_en: the art or skill of cooking
